title: FS: T227 Poster Cut Marquard - One of a Kind ($old)
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: T227 Poster Cut Marquard - One of a Kind ($old)
posts.post_content:
$old 

I think this is probably one of a kind. I have only been able to find discussion of a single lot of T227 poster cut cards - it sold at a Mastro auction long ago. I have also spoken to others who know about these and they agree that they haven't seen anything apart from that single lot (all BVG graded).
